name: Bumpercars On Ice
description:
Battle your friend in an arcade style local multiplayer game. You each control a car and you can pick up weapons (Spikes and guns) to use to destroy your opponent. Look out for the bumpers in the middle of the map, they bounce you back!

Controls Controller (XBox):

A - Accelerate
X - Reverse
RT - Fire
Left analog stick - Turn left/right
Start - Pause

Keyboard (Player1):

W - Accelerate
S - Reverse
A - Turn Left
D - Turn Right
Left Shift - Fire
Esc - Pause

Keyboard (Player2):

Up Arrow - Accelerate
Down Arrow - Reverse
Left Arrow - Turn Left
Right Arrow - Turn Right
Right Control - Fire
Esc - Pause
